text: Mikhaylovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnoyarsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2010. There are 9 streets. == Geography == It is located 16 km from Sterlitamak, 8 km from Novy Krasnoyar. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Mikhaylovka, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
